description: You are about to meet the Reacher Creature. It reaches out of the darkness and grabs you, sapping your energy. But when it puts you down again, you have no memory of what happened.

puzzles.description: Make Dash automatically play the Whistle #1 sound then instantly move forward with both wheels set to 15 cm/s.
puzzles.introduction: Dash is pretty happy walking through the forest. Everything seems perfectly fine...

hints.description: Link the Moving Basics state with an Instant cue to make Dash move while whistling.

puzzles.description: When Dash is moving forward, if Dash is picked up, make Dash say Help! and automatically push to try and get away.
puzzles.introduction: Something giant reaches out from the darkness and grabs Dash!

hints.description: Link the Moving Basics state to the sound with a Picked Up cue. Pick Dash up with your hands to trigger this cue.

puzzles.description: After pushing to get away, make Dash stop if Dash is put down. Then make Dash automatically say Ahh and play the Whistle #1 sound again.
puzzles.introduction: But once Dash is put back down, everything's cool, and Dash continues merrily along the dark and creepy path.

hints.description: Link the Push state to the Stop state with a Put Down cue. Then make a loop by linking the Ahh sound with Auto cues.
